PROJECT(${QTAWESOME_LIBRARY})
  
SET(SOURCES QtAwesome.cpp
            QtAwesomeAnim.cpp)

# images
SET(RESOURCES QtAwesome.qrc)
QT5_ADD_RESOURCES(RESOURCES_RCC ${RESOURCES})

IF (AGROS_BUILD_STATIC)
    ADD_LIBRARY(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${SOURCES} ${RESOURCES_RCC})
ELSE()
    ADD_LIBRARY(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED ${SOURCES} ${RESOURCES_RCC})
ENDIF()

QT5_USE_MODULES(${PROJECT_NAME} Core Widgets)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECT_NAME} ${QT_LIBRARIES})
